imdb.plot outline: Travel around the world with Vivi, as she sets out to find the whimsical world of Whirligig - a fantastical place where imagination reigns supreme. Come join Vivi and her adorable pals, Backpack and Flashy, as she imagines a series of enchanting adventures which come to life within the pages of her scrapbook. In each episode the trio is whisked away on a magical journey, full of colorful fun, new friends and valuable life lessons.
imdb.title: Vivi Viravento
plot: Travel around the world with Vivi, as she sets out to find the whimsical world of Whirligig - a fantastical place where imagination reigns supreme. In each episode the trio is whisked away on a magical journey, full of colorful fun, new friends and valuable life lessons.::Mixer Films
